name: Kenneth R. ROONEY, an Individual, Appellant, v. Naaman F. BARR, an Individual

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: Kenneth R. ROONEY, an Individual, Appellant, v. Naaman F. BARR, an Individual.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to bear own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Richard L. Rosenzweig, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
359 A.2d 364
Kenneth R. ROONEY, an Individual, Appellant, v. Naaman F. BARR, an Individual.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 11, 1976.
Decided July 6, 1976.
Richard L. Rosenzweig, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
No appearance for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
